text: Gummels Heliport , is the first dedicated Heliport built in Suriname at the Gummelsweg in the neighborhood of Kwatta near the city of Paramaribo, Suriname. Privately owned and used by the Gummels family who also own the Gum Air airline and the crop dust service Surinam Sky Farmers. The heliport is mainly used for helicopter charters and primarily for offshore development activities. == Charters == Major charter airlines and others serving this airport are: ==See also== * * * List of airports in Suriname * Transport in Suriname ==References== Category:Airports in Suriname
title: Gummels Heliport
